name: pm3-monorepo
description: Sistema de Gestión de Turnos Médicos - Monorepo

scripts.install-all: cd back && npm install && cd ../front && npm install
scripts.build: npm run install-all && cd front && npm run build && cd ../back && npm run build
scripts.render-build: npm run install-all && cd front && npm run build && cd ../back && npm run build
